tool_description: The Safe Browsing API is a service that allows users to check URLs for potential security threats. This API interacts with Google's Safe Browsing service to provide real-time information about the safety status of a given URL.
name: Url Security
title: Url Security

api_list.name: URL Safety Checker API
api_list.description:
**URL Safety Checker API
**
The URL Safety Checker API allows you to check the safety of a URL by leveraging the power of the Google Safe Browsing API. It helps you identify potentially harmful websites that may contain malware or engage in social engineering attacks.

Key Features

-** URL Safety Checking**: Submit a URL and receive an indication of whether it is safe or potentially harmful.

-** Integration with Google Safe Browsing**: Utilizes the Google Safe Browsing API to perform comprehensive threat analysis on the provided URL.


How to Use

- Sign up for an account and obtain an API key.
- Submit a URL to the /check-url endpoint via a POST request.
- Receive the safety status of the URL, indicating whether it is safe or potentially harmful.
- Take appropriate actions based on the safety status to protect users or systems from potential threats.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://url-security.p.rapidapi.com/check-url"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "url-security.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://url-security.p.rapidapi.com/check-url"

headers = {

print(response.json())
